original_text: There are men from Teman city that fight. But I will make them afraid. Esau's people live in the mountains. And everyone there will die. There are men from Teman city that fight. But I will make them afraid. Esau's people live in the mountains. And everyone there will die. There are men from Teman city that fight. But I will make them afraid.
korean_text: 드만아 네 용사들이 놀랄 것이라 이로 말미암아 에서의 산에 있는 사람은 다 죽임을 당하여 멸절되리라

sentences.original_text: There are men from Teman city that fight.
But I will make them afraid.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 내가 그들을 두려워하게 만들 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: Esau's people live in the mountains.

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그곳의 모든 사람은 죽을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: There are men from Teman city that fight.
But I will make them afraid.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 내가 그들을 두려워하게 만들 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: Esau's people live in the mountains.

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그곳의 모든 사람은 죽을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: There are men from Teman city that fight.
But I will make them afraid.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 내가 그들을 두려워하게 만들 것입니다.
